gov.usgs.anss.edgemom

Class IndexFileServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.usgs.anss.edgethread.EdgeThread
        • gov.usgs.anss.edgemom.IndexFileServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class IndexFileServer
extends EdgeThread
    This class listens to connections, read in information on a target file (julian day, node) and causes that entire IndexFile, if present, to be put into the EdgeBlockQueue for this instance. The IndexFile is therefore forced in its entirety to any listening EdgeBlockClients/Replicators. This class should be configured whenever an EdgeBlockServer is configured. 
    switch args    Description
-p     pppp    The port to listen on
-dbg           Turn on debug output
>[>]   filename Redirect output to this file
    IndexFileServer.java
